hero.title: Your best email campaign in 2min
hero.description: From your competitors' emails and sequences and favorite brands, generate strategic reports on the fly, but most importantly your own emails and complete sequences, with one click.

features.title: Millions of indexed emails
features.description: Access the largest database of marketing emails from hundreds of brands
features.search_description: Instantly find campaigns by brand, subject, period or strategy
features.analysis_description: Identify patterns and strategies that work in your industry
features.tracking_description: Track your competitors in real-time without lifting a finger

benefits.section_title: Find marketing inspiration instantly with emailoverflow
benefits.search_all_text: Find the perfect email, ad or landing page instantly with the most advanced marketing search engine.
benefits.auto_tracking_text: Monitor all your competitors in one place. No need to manually subscribe to hundreds of newsletters.
benefits.realtime_text: Get instant alerts when your competitors launch new campaigns, change their prices or update their strategy.
benefits.save_time_text: Stop manually monitoring your competitors. Focus on strategy while we handle the monitoring for you.
benefits.assets_text: Access the world's largest library of emails, ads, landing pages and marketing campaigns.
benefits.benchmarks_text: Compare your performance against your competitors with real-time data and actionable recommendations.
benefits.ai_generation_text: Generate complete email sequences and campaigns in seconds with AI trained on millions of high-performing emails.
benefits.collaboration_text: Share insights, save favorites, and work together seamlessly with your marketing team in one unified workspace.

how_it_works.label: How it works
how_it_works.signup_text: Create your account in 2 minutes. Add your competitors and let our platform automatically track their marketing strategies across all channels.
how_it_works.add_competitors_text: Select the brands you want to monitor. We'll track their emails, ads, landing pages, SMS, website changes and more in real-time.
how_it_works.get_insights_text: Receive automated summaries and recommendations. Our AI analyzes what your competitors are doing and suggests opportunities for your campaigns.
how_it_works.take_action_text: Use insights to create winning campaigns. Search our library of 100M+ assets, save inspiration and collaborate with your team.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.free_description: Perfect to get started and explore the platform
pricing.pro_description: For teams and agencies that need unlimited access

testimonials.title: What the community says
testimonials.sarah_text: I save a full day per week. I never miss an update and no longer have to think about competitor tracking. emailoverflow has revolutionized our team.
testimonials.mike_text: It's incredibly good and easy to use, you can track everything! I feel like a Sherlock Holmes for emails, ads and landing pages. Best investment of the year.
testimonials.emma_text: The recommendations and insights are perfect. It's so easy to plan my content calendar and make the right decisions. We've increased our campaign performance by 40%.
testimonials.david_text: I just replaced 3 software tools at €400 each with emailoverflow. It's incredibly valuable to track and compare brands with such specific recommendations. Our clients love it.

faq.q1_text: emailoverflow is a competitive intelligence platform that automatically tracks your competitors' marketing strategies. Monitor emails, ads, landing pages, SMS, website changes and more from 80,000+ brands across 100+ industries. Instantly access over 100M marketing assets and real-time insights to outperform your competition.
faq.q2_text: Simply sign up and add the competitors you want to track. emailoverflow automatically monitors their marketing activities 24/7 across all channels. You'll receive real-time alerts, automated summaries and AI-powered recommendations. Access our advanced search engine to find inspiration instantly from our vast library of emails, ads and landing pages.
faq.q3_title: What can I track with emailoverflow?
faq.q3_text: You can track emails and newsletters, email flows and automations, Meta/TikTok/YouTube/LinkedIn ads, landing pages, SMS campaigns, website changes, social media posts, SEO strategy, price changes, product launches, and more. We cover all major marketing channels and provide historical data so you never miss a competitive update.
faq.q4_text: We offer flexible pricing plans ranging from our free tier to enterprise solutions. Our paid plans start at €199/month and include unlimited competitor tracking, full access to our 100M+ asset library, real-time benchmarks, AI insights and team collaboration tools. Check our pricing page for detailed plan comparisons and features.
faq.q5_title: How can I get started with emailoverflow?
faq.q5_text: Getting started is easy and takes just 2 minutes. Sign up for free, add your competitors, and our platform starts tracking automatically. No credit card required for the free trial. You can schedule a demo with our team if you'd like a personalized walkthrough of the platform and its features.

roadmap.title: What we're working on
roadmap.multi_channel_text: Extended tracking on TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn, Pinterest ads, SMS campaigns and social media posts for complete competitive visibility.
roadmap.ai_insights_text: Advanced AI recommendations that analyze competitive strategies and suggest specific campaign ideas based on industry trends and performance data.
roadmap.custom_dashboards_text: Fully customizable dashboards with drag-and-drop widgets, custom metrics and white-label options for agencies and enterprise clients.
roadmap.api_text: Public API access and direct integrations with popular marketing tools like Klaviyo, HubSpot, Shopify and Slack for seamless workflows.
